movies.title: Midnight Lanes
movies.tagline: Neon heists under the midnight sky.
movies.synopsis: A shadow driver races through city lights to save a crew whose future depends on one last lap.

movies.title: Aurora Runs
movies.tagline: When the storm won't hold, the pilots push harder.
movies.synopsis: A test pilot with a mechanical heart races across the arctic to prove the impossible is human.

movies.title: Glass Ocean
movies.synopsis: A detective slips between mirrored realities to track a signal that could topple a metropolis.

movies.title: Neon Frequency
movies.synopsis: A late-night DJ discovers a hidden conspiracy encoded in the city's signal noise.

movies.title: Last Screen Hero
movies.synopsis: An aging action star returns for one more mission to protect the city he built.

movies.title: Dawn Run
movies.synopsis: A courier must deliver a cure before the sun rises, navigating a city that never slows.

movies.title: Heatwave Diaries
movies.synopsis: A group of friends document the city's hottest mystery in the sweltering streets of summer.

movies.title: North Star
movies.synopsis: A lost hiker follows aurora trails that mirror his childhood memories and a secret society.

movies.title: Crimson Orbit
movies.synopsis: A rogue shuttle pilot is forced into a heist that could destabilize a planetary coalition.

movies.title: City of Echoes
movies.tagline: Recall the past to rewrite the future.
movies.synopsis: A former operative returns to a city that has erased him, racing against a phantom syndicate.

movies.title: Paper Planes
movies.synopsis: A shy paper engineer joins a ragtag postal crew to deliver laughter across town.

movies.title: Side Street Ballet
movies.synopsis: Street dancers choreograph an underground ballet that unites the downtown scene.

movies.title: Rogue Protocol
movies.tagline: Funding the mission with a code you can't read.
movies.synopsis: A tech-savvy cell safeguards the last untraceable network while rival forces close in.

movies.title: Fury Lane
movies.synopsis: An undercover racer swaps bullets for burnout stunts to collapse a criminal delivery ring.

movies.title: Blizzard Run
movies.synopsis: A weather-controlling operative is forced to throw the grid into chaos to save her squad.

movies.title: Iron Forest
movies.synopsis: A botanist turned cyborg fights to protect the last green reserve from mercenary loggers.

movies.title: Stand-Up Now
movies.synopsis: Four comedians turn a midnight garage into the city's most honest stage.

movies.title: Retro Replay
movies.synopsis: An arcade crew reboots classic games to prank the city's most serious mayor.

movies.title: Mock Trials
movies.tagline: Justice served with a side of satire.
movies.synopsis: A courtroom parody troupe uncovers a real scandal while ferrying props between gigs.

movies.title: Late Night Snack
movies.synopsis: A culinary crew steals the night with a pop-up diner for insomniacs and dreamers.
